body:
Features and Enhancements

Provider Profile Export
  • From the Provider Profile page, users can now export provider data from the 'Export' button
Network Modeling Permissions
  • Network Modeling Permissions have been updated for the non-admin user role:
    • CAN perform all function on any of their own Network Models and Virtual Networks
    • CAN view and clone others' Network Models and Virtual Models
    • CANNOT edit or delete others' Network Models
    • CANNOT restore or delete others' Virtual Networks
  • Admin users will be unaffected by these changes.
Network Modeling: Add / Remove Providers
  • Network Modeling users can now add and remove specific providers from their model:
    • Search for provider by Name, NPI, Strenuus or Client Id
    • Add or Remove a provider, along with all associated locations and specialties, in a single step
Competitive Dashboard Enhancements
  • Advanced search options are now a part of the search page users see when they first access the tile.
  • The 'Export Network Counts' button has been moved from the search page to the Dashboard Results page.
  • Additional changes to the Dashboard Results page exports:
    • PDF option is available for Competitive Dashboard Report and contains Project Summary and Market Penetration
    • CSV option is available for all exports and includes Top Hospitals by Bed Count
